name: struggle-bug
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.sun-moon: While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. This lowers the Sp. Atk stat of those hit.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. This lowers the Sp. Atk stat of those hit.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. This lowers the Sp. Atk stat of those hit.
